scripts.indexes:sync: npm run build && node lib/functions/src/dev/indexesManager.js sync
scripts.indexes:check: npm run build && node lib/functions/src/dev/indexesManager.js check
scripts.e2e:check: INFRA_ENV=staging npm run indexes:check && FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_HOST=127.0.0.1:8080 E2E_CLEANUP=1 npm run e2e:once
scripts.e2e:check:timeout: timeout 180s bash -lc 'FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_HOST=127.0.0.1:8080 E2E_CLEANUP=1 npm run e2e:once'
scripts.e2e:once: npm run build && TASKS_EXECUTE_INLINE=1 E2E_SKIP_STORAGE=1 node scripts/preflight.mjs --mode=e2e && TASKS_EXECUTE_INLINE=1 E2E_SKIP_STORAGE=1 node lib/functions/src/dev/e2eOnce.js
